name: top
description: Collects the top values for a field. Includes repeated values.

params.name: field
params.description: The field to collect the top values for.

params.name: limit
params.description: The maximum number of values to collect.

params.name: order
params.description: The order to calculate the top values. Either `asc` or `desc`.

params.name: field

params.name: limit

params.name: order
params.description: The order to calculate the top values. Either `asc` or `desc`.

examples:
FROM employees
| STATS top_salaries = TOP(salary, 3, "desc"), top_salary = MAX(salary)
